tool_description: Creates a new workplace incident report with basic incident information and generates a unique incident ID for tracking purposes.

incident_date.description: Date and time when the incident occurred

reporter_name.description: Full name of the person reporting the incident

reporter_contact.description: Contact information (phone or email) of the reporter

incident_description.description: Brief description of what happened during the incident

error_messages: Invalid incident date: Provide a valid ISO 8601 date-time format and ensure the date is not in the future.
Missing reporter information: Both reporter_name and reporter_contact are required fields.
Insufficient incident description: Provide a description with at least 10 characters.
Invalid contact format: Ensure reporter_contact contains valid phone number or email address format.
usage: Provide the incident_date, reporter_name, reporter_contact, and incident_description to create a new incident report. The tool will generate a unique incident ID and timestamp the report creation.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to this incident report

report_created.description: Timestamp when the report was created

status.description: Current status of the incident report
